scripts.prepare:testnet: mustache ./config/testnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache ./config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.deploy-testnet: yarn && yarn prepare:testnet && graph deploy davekaj/billing --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-mainnet: yarn && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy graphprotocol/billing --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-test: yarn && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy <SUBGRAPH_NAME> --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
